sections.content: Free dribbling in a confined area, 'Dribble Tag' (one or two players are 'it' and try to tag others while everyone dribbles).

Cone Dribbling: Dribble through cones using inside and outside of the foot.
Stop & Go: Dribble, stop the ball with the sole, accelerate in a new direction.
Bell Touches: Rapidly tap the top of the ball with alternating feet.
3v3 with emphasis on keeping the ball close and changing direction.
